chinese: 这个理论太深奥了, 您能不能讲得通透一点?
english: The theory is too difficult to understand, can you elaborate on it?

chinese: 天空由通透的湛蓝色变成了暗灰色。
english: The sky was changing from translucent blue to thicker grey.

chinese: 将物件放在灯座，看看哪一件通透能力最强？
english: Put each object in front of the lamp . which one is the most transparent
